verses.verse: ( Cain and Abel) ( 650 11:4 ) וְהָ֣אָדָ֔ם <WH120> wə·hā·’ā·ḏām And Adam יָדַ֖ע <WH3045> yā·ḏa‘ had relations with אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - חַוָּ֣ה <WH2332> ḥaw·wāh Eve, אִשְׁתּ֑וֹ <WH802> ’iš·tōw his wife וַתַּ֙הַר֙ <WH2029> wat·ta·har and she conceived וַתֵּ֣לֶד <WH3205> wat·tê·leḏ and gave birth to אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - קַ֔יִן <WH7014> qa·yin Cain. ( Cain sounds like the Hebrew for acquired or brought forth.) וַתֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> wat·tō·mer she said. קָנִ֥יתִי <WH7069> qā·nî·ṯî I have brought forth אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> ’îš a man, ” אֶת־ <WH854> ’eṯ- “ With the help of יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD

וַתֹּ֣סֶף <WH3254> wat·tō·sep̄ Later לָלֶ֔דֶת <WH3205> lā·le·ḏeṯ she gave birth אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - אָחִ֖יו <WH251> ’ā·ḥîw to [Cain’s] brother אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - הָ֑בֶל <WH1893> hā·ḇel Abel. וַֽיְהִי־ <WH1961> way·hî- Now הֶ֙בֶל֙ <WH1893> he·ḇel Abel רֹ֣עֵה <WH7462> rō·‘êh a keeper צֹ֔אן <WH6629> ṣōn of sheep, וְקַ֕יִן <WH7014> wə·qa·yin while Cain הָיָ֖ה <WH1961> hā·yāh was עֹבֵ֥ד <WH5647> ‘ō·ḇêḏ was a tiller אֲדָמָֽה׃ <WH127> ’ă·ḏā·māh of the soil.

וַֽיְהִ֖י <WH1961> way·hî -, מִקֵּ֣ץ <WH7093> miq·qêṣ So in the course יָמִ֑ים <WH3117> yā·mîm of time וַיָּבֵ֨א <WH935> way·yā·ḇê brought קַ֜יִן <WH7014> qa·yin Cain מִפְּרִ֧י <WH6529> mip·pə·rî some of the fruit הָֽאֲדָמָ֛ה <WH127> hā·’ă·ḏā·māh of the soil מִנְחָ֖ה <WH4503> min·ḥāh as an offering לַֽיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah·weh to the LORD,

וְהֶ֨בֶל <WH1893> wə·he·ḇel while Abel הֵבִ֥יא <WH935> hê·ḇî brought גַם־ <WH1571> ḡam- - ה֛וּא <WH1931> hū ... מִבְּכֹר֥וֹת <WH1060> mib·bə·ḵō·rō·wṯ of the firstborn צֹאנ֖וֹ <WH6629> ṣō·nōw of his flock. וּמֵֽחֶלְבֵהֶ֑ן <WH2459> ū·mê·ḥel·ḇê·hen the best portions וַיִּ֣שַׁע <WH8159> way·yi·ša‘ looked with favor יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah·weh And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> ’el- on הֶ֖בֶל <WH1893> he·ḇel Abel וְאֶל־ <WH413> wə·’el- and מִנְחָתֽוֹ׃ <WH4503> min·ḥā·ṯōw his offering,

וְאֶל־ <WH413> wə·’el- but קַ֥יִן <WH7014> qa·yin Cain וְאֶל־ <WH413> wə·’el- for מִנְחָת֖וֹ <WH4503> min·ḥā·ṯōw and his offering. לֹ֣א <WH3808> lō He had no שָׁעָ֑ה <WH8159> šā·‘āh regard וַיִּ֤חַר <WH2734> way·yi·ḥar angry, לְקַ֙יִן֙ <WH7014> lə·qa·yin So Cain מְאֹ֔ד <WH3966> mə·’ōḏ became very וַֽיִּפְּל֖וּ <WH5307> way·yip·pə·lū fell. פָּנָֽיו׃ <WH6440> pā·nāw and his countenance

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> way·yō·mer said יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> ’el- to קָ֑יִן <WH7014> qā·yin Cain, לָ֚מָּה <WH4100> lām·māh “ Why חָ֣רָה <WH2734> ḥā·rāh are you angry, ” לָ֔ךְ Prep│2fs ( lāḵ) “ - וְלָ֖מָּה 4100 Conj-w│Interrog ( wə·lām·māh) and why נָפְל֥וּ 5307 V-Qal-Perf-3cp ( nā·p̄ə·lū) fallen? פָנֶֽיךָ׃ 6440 N-cpc│2ms ( p̄ā·ne·ḵā) has your countenance

הֲל֤וֹא <WH3808> hă·lō·w will אִם־ <WH518> ’im- If תֵּיטִיב֙ <WH3190> tê·ṭîḇ you do what is right, שְׂאֵ֔ת <WH7613> śə·’êṯ be accepted? וְאִם֙ <WH518> wə·’im But if לֹ֣א <WH3808> lō you not תֵיטִ֔יב <WH3190> ṯê·ṭîḇ you refuse to do what is right, לַפֶּ֖תַח <WH6607> lap·pe·ṯaḥ at your door; חַטָּ֣את <WH2403> ḥaṭ·ṭāṯ sin רֹבֵ֑ץ <WH7257> rō·ḇêṣ is crouching וְאֵלֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH413> wə·’ê·le·ḵā you, ( Or it desires to control you) תְּשׁ֣וּקָת֔וֹ <WH8669> tə·šū·qā·ṯōw it desires וְאַתָּ֖ה <WH859> wə·’at·tāh but you תִּמְשָׁל־ <WH4910> tim·šāl- must master בּֽוֹ׃ Prep│3ms ( bōw) it. ”

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> way·yō·mer said קַ֖יִן <WH7014> qa·yin Then Cain אֶל־ <WH413> ’el- to הֶ֣בֶל <WH1893> he·ḇel Abel, [“Let us go out to the field.”] ( SP, LXX, Syriac, and Vulgate; Hebrew Then Cain spoke to his brother Abel.) אָחִ֑יו <WH251> ’ā·ḥîw his brother וַֽיְהִי֙ <WH1961> way·hî And בִּהְיוֹתָ֣ם <WH1961> bih·yō·w·ṯām while they were בַּשָּׂדֶ֔ה <WH7704> baś·śā·ḏeh in the field, וַיָּ֥קָם <WH6965> way·yā·qām rose up קַ֛יִן <WH7014> qa·yin Cain אֶל־ <WH413> ’el- against הֶ֥בֶל <WH1893> he·ḇel Abel אָחִ֖יו <WH251> ’ā·ḥîw his brother וַיַּהַרְגֵֽהוּ׃ <WH2026> way·ya·har·ḡê·hū and killed him.

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> way·yō·mer said יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah·weh And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> ’el- to קַ֔יִן <WH7014> qa·yin Cain, אֵ֖י <WH335> ’ê “ Where הֶ֣בֶל <WH1893> he·ḇel Abel? ” אָחִ֑יךָ <WH251> ’ā·ḥî·ḵā [is] your brother וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> way·yō·mer he answered. לֹ֣א <WH3808> lō “ I do not יָדַ֔עְתִּי <WH3045> yā·ḏa‘·tî know! ” הֲשֹׁמֵ֥ר <WH8104> hă·šō·mêr keeper? ” אָחִ֖י <WH251> ’ā·ḥî my brother’s אָנֹֽכִי׃ <WH595> ’ā·nō·ḵî “  Am  I

וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> way·yō·mer replied [the LORD]. מֶ֣ה <WH4100> meh “ What עָשִׂ֑יתָ <WH6213> ‘ā·śî·ṯā have you done? ” ק֚וֹל <WH6963> qō·wl “ The voice דְּמֵ֣י <WH1818> də·mê blood אָחִ֔יךָ <WH251> ’ā·ḥî·ḵā of your brother’s צֹעֲקִ֥ים <WH6817> ṣō·‘ă·qîm cries out אֵלַ֖י <WH413> ’ê·lay to Me מִן־ <WH4480> min- from הָֽאֲדָמָֽה׃ <WH127> hā·’ă·ḏā·māh the ground.

וְעַתָּ֖ה <WH6258> wə·‘at·tāh Now אָר֣וּר <WH779> ’ā·rūr [are] cursed and banished אָ֑תָּה <WH859> ’āt·tāh you מִן־ <WH4480> min- from הָֽאֲדָמָה֙ <WH127> hā·’ă·ḏā·māh the ground, אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> ’ă·šer which פָּצְתָ֣ה <WH6475> pā·ṣə·ṯāh has opened אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - פִּ֔יהָ <WH6310> pî·hā its mouth לָקַ֛חַת <WH3947> lā·qa·ḥaṯ to receive אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - דְּמֵ֥י <WH1818> də·mê blood אָחִ֖יךָ <WH251> ’ā·ḥî·ḵā your brother’s מִיָּדֶֽךָ׃ <WH3027> mî·yā·ḏe·ḵā from your hand.

כִּ֤י <WH3588> kî When תַֽעֲבֹד֙ <WH5647> ṯa·‘ă·ḇōḏ you till אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - הָ֣אֲדָמָ֔ה <WH127> hā·’ă·ḏā·māh the ground, לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lō- it will  no תֹסֵ֥ף <WH3254> ṯō·sêp̄ longer תֵּת־ <WH5414> têṯ- yield כֹּחָ֖הּ <WH3581> kō·ḥāh its produce לָ֑ךְ Prep│2fs ( lāḵ) to you. נָ֥ע 5128 V-Qal-Prtcpl-ms ( nā‘) a fugitive וָנָ֖ד 5110 Conj-w│V-Qal-Prtcpl-ms ( wā·nāḏ) and a wanderer תִּֽהְיֶ֥ה 1961 V-Qal-Imperf-2ms ( tih·yeh) You will be בָאָֽרֶץ׃ 776 Prep-b, Art│N-fs ( ḇā·’ā·reṣ) on the earth. ”

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> way·yō·mer said קַ֖יִן <WH7014> qa·yin But Cain אֶל־ <WH413> ’el- to יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD, גָּד֥וֹל <WH1419> gā·ḏō·wl [is] greater עֲוֺנִ֖י <WH5771> ‘ă·wō·nî “ My punishment ( Or guilt or sin) מִנְּשֹֽׂא׃ <WH5375> min·nə·śō than I can bear.

הֵן֩ <WH2005> hên Behold, גֵּרַ֨שְׁתָּ <WH1644> gê·raš·tā You have driven me אֹתִ֜י <WH853> ’ō·ṯî this הַיּ֗וֹם <WH3117> hay·yō·wm day מֵעַל֙ <WH5921> mê·‘al and from פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> pə·nê from the face הָֽאֲדָמָ֔ה <WH127> hā·’ă·ḏā·māh of the earth, וּמִפָּנֶ֖יךָ <WH6440> ū·mip·pā·ne·ḵā Your face אֶסָּתֵ֑ר <WH5641> ’es·sā·ṯêr I will be hidden; וְהָיִ֜יתִי <WH1961> wə·hā·yî·ṯî I  will  be נָ֤ע <WH5128> nā‘ a fugitive וָנָד֙ <WH5110> wā·nāḏ and a wanderer בָּאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> bā·’ā·reṣ on the earth, וְהָיָ֥ה <WH1961> wə·hā·yāh and כָל־ <WH3605> ḵāl whoever מֹצְאִ֖י <WH4672> mō·ṣə·’î finds me יַֽהַרְגֵֽנִי׃ <WH2026> ya·har·ḡê·nî will  kill me. ”

וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <WH559> way·yō·mer replied ל֣וֹ Prep│3ms ( lōw) -. יְהוָ֗ה 3068 N-proper-ms ( Yah·weh) the LORD לָכֵן֙ 3651 Adv ( lā·ḵên) “ Not so! ” כָּל־ 3605 N-msc ( kāl-) “ If anyone הֹרֵ֣ג 2026 V-Qal-Prtcpl-msc ( hō·rêḡ) slays קַ֔יִן 7014 N-proper-ms ( qa·yin) Cain, שִׁבְעָתַ֖יִם 7659 Number-fd ( šiḇ·‘ā·ṯa·yim) sevenfold. ” יֻקָּ֑ם 5358 V-Hofal-Imperf-3ms ( yuq·qām) [then Cain] will be avenged וַיָּ֨שֶׂם 7760 Conj-w│V-Qal-ConsecImperf-3ms ( way·yā·śem) placed יְהוָ֤ה 3068 N-proper-ms ( Yah·weh) And the LORD לְקַ֙יִן֙ 7014 Prep-l│N-proper-ms ( lə·qa·yin) on Cain, א֔וֹת 226 N-cs ( ’ō·wṯ) a mark לְבִלְתִּ֥י 1115 Prep-l ( lə·ḇil·tî) so that no one הַכּוֹת־ 5221 V-Hifil-Inf ( hak·kō·wṯ-) would kill אֹת֖וֹ 853 DirObjM│3ms ( ’ō·ṯōw) him. כָּל־ 3605 N-msc ( kāl-) ... מֹצְאֽוֹ׃ 4672 V-Qal-Prtcpl-msc│3ms ( mō·ṣə·’ōw) who found him

וַיֵּ֥צֵא <WH3318> way·yê·ṣê went out קַ֖יִן <WH7014> qa·yin So Cain מִלִּפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> mil·lip̄·nê from the presence יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah·weh of the LORD וַיֵּ֥שֶׁב <WH3427> way·yê·šeḇ and settled בְּאֶֽרֶץ־ <WH776> bə·’e·reṣ- in the land נ֖וֹד <WH5113> nō·wḏ of Nod, ( Nod means wandering.) קִדְמַת־ <WH6926> qiḏ·maṯ- east עֵֽדֶן׃ <WH5731> ‘ê·ḏen of Eden.

וַיֵּ֤דַע <WH3045> way·yê·ḏa‘ had relations with ( The Descendants of Cain) קַ֙יִן֙ <WH7014> qa·yin And Cain אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - אִשְׁתּ֔וֹ <WH802> ’iš·tōw his wife, וַתַּ֖הַר <WH2029> wat·ta·har and she conceived וַתֵּ֣לֶד <WH3205> wat·tê·leḏ and gave birth to אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - חֲנ֑וֹךְ <WH2585> ḥă·nō·wḵ Enoch. וַֽיְהִי֙ <WH1961> way·hî Then בֹּ֣נֶה <WH1129> bō·neh [Cain] built עִ֔יר <WH5892> ‘îr a city וַיִּקְרָא֙ <WH7121> way·yiq·rā and named שֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> šêm ... הָעִ֔יר <WH5892> hā·‘îr [it] כְּשֵׁ֖ם <WH8034> kə·šêm after בְּנ֥וֹ <WH1121> bə·nōw his son חֲנֽוֹךְ׃ <WH2585> ḥă·nō·wḵ Enoch.

וַיִּוָּלֵ֤ד <WH3205> way·yiw·wā·lêḏ was born לַֽחֲנוֹךְ֙ <WH2585> la·ḥă·nō·wḵ Now to Enoch אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - עִירָ֔ד <WH5897> ‘î·rāḏ Irad, וְעִירָ֕ד <WH5897> wə·‘î·rāḏ and Irad יָלַ֖ד <WH3205> yā·laḏ was the father of אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - מְחֽוּיָאֵ֑ל <WH4232> mə·ḥū·yā·’êl Mehujael, וּמְחִיּיָאֵ֗ל <WH4232> ū·mə·ḥî·y·yā·’êl and Mehujael יָלַד֙ <WH3205> yā·laḏ was the father of אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - מְת֣וּשָׁאֵ֔ל <WH4967> mə·ṯū·šā·’êl Methusael, וּמְתוּשָׁאֵ֖ל <WH4967> ū·mə·ṯū·šā·’êl and Methusael יָלַ֥ד <WH3205> yā·laḏ was the father of אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - לָֽמֶךְ׃ <WH3929> lā·meḵ Lamech.

וַיִּֽקַּֽח־ <WH3947> way·yiq·qaḥ- married ל֥וֹ Prep│3ms ( lōw) ... לֶ֖מֶךְ 3929 N-proper-ms ( le·meḵ) And Lamech שְׁתֵּ֣י 8147 Number-fdc ( šə·tê) two נָשִׁ֑ים 802 N-fp ( nā·šîm) women, שֵׁ֤ם 8034 N-msc ( šêm) named הָֽאַחַת֙ 259 Art│Number-fs ( hā·’a·ḥaṯ) one עָדָ֔ה 5711 N-proper-fs ( ‘ā·ḏāh) Adah וְשֵׁ֥ם 8034 Conj-w│N-msc ( wə·šêm) and הַשֵּׁנִ֖ית 8145 Art│Number-ofs ( haš·šê·nîṯ) the other צִלָּֽה׃ 6741 N-proper-fs ( ṣil·lāh) Zillah.
